mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient (patient_id, social_id, name, gender, phone_number) VALUES (seq_patient_id.NEXTVAL, #{social_id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone_number})
INSERT INTO patient_account(patient_id, email, pw, join_date) VALUES (#{patient_id}, #{email}, #{pw}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT s.staff_id, s.department_id, s.name, s.social_id, s.email, s.phone_number, s.introduction, d.department_name FROM staff s INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id WHERE s.department_id = #{department_id}

SELECT m.*, s.name staff_name, s.department_id, d.department_name, p.prescription_record_id, p.prescription_name, t.name patient_name FROM medical_record m INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id INNER JOIN prescription_record p ON m.medical_record_id = p.medical_record_id INNER JOIN patient t ON m.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE m.patient_id = #{patient_id}

SELECT a.*, m.treatment_name, s.name, d.department_name, w.ward_number, w.bed FROM admission_record a INNER JOIN medical_record m ON a.medical_record_id = m.medical_record_id INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id INNER JOIN ward w ON a.ward_id = w.ward_id WHERE m.patient_id = #{patient_id}

SELECT m.*, s.name, s.email, s.introduction, d.department_name, d.location FROM medical_receipt m INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id WHERE m.patient_id = #{patient_id}

SELECT m.*, s.name, s.email, s.introduction, d.department_name, d.location FROM medical_receipt m INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id WHERE m.staff_id = #{staff_id}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT a.*, m.treatment_name, s.name, d.department_name, w.ward_number, w.bed FROM admission_record a INNER JOIN medical_record m ON a.medical_record_id = m.medical_record_id INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id INNER JOIN ward w ON a.ward_id = w.ward_id WHERE m.patient_id = #{patient_id} ORDER BY admission_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM staff WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR introduction Like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' AND staff_level = 1
SELECT s.*, d.department_name FROM staff s INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id WHERE d.department_name LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' AND staff_level = 1

SELECT m.*, s.name, d.department_name FROM medical_receipt m INNER JOIN staff s ON m.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id WHERE time BETWEEN TO_DATE((#{today}),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE((#{today}+1),'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_receipt (patient_id, staff_id, time, memo) VALUES (#{patient_id}, #{staff_id}, TO_DATE((#{time}),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{memo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM medical_receipt WHERE staff_id = #{staff_id} AND time = TO_DATE((#{time}),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
